alert.note: Alert for Albany; Greene; Schoharie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 3:57PM EDT until August 04 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Albany County in east central New York... Central Greene County in east central New York... Southern Schoharie County in east central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Summit, or 10 miles southwest of Cobleskill, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Windham, Gilboa, Summit, Livingstonville, North Blenheim, Breakabeen, Preston-Potter Hollow, Preston Hollow, Durham, Rensselaerville, Ashland, Conesville, West Settlement, Baird Corners, Maplecrest, Broome Center, West Fulton, Sunside and Arabia. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
